div.p:
COVID-19 UPDATE - April 17, 2020
Channing ISD will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year. Please click here for our official closure announcement.
Click here for Channing ISD's Instructional Continuity Plan during school closure. This includes the district's plan for instruction, communication from teachers, and distribution of packet pick-up . . .

div.span: Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 52. South wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Mostly sunny, with a high near 84. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph becoming east northeast in the afternoon.
Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. East wind 5 to 10 mph becoming west after midnight.
